## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                    | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------ | -------- | ----------- |
| `max`    | `max`     | The value of "100%"            | `number` | `undefined` |
| `value`  | `value`   | The actual progress of the bar | `number` | `undefined` |
